label: bike
caption: A stunt rider expertly navigates his green motorcycle, performing a daring jump over a row of ten stationary bikes laid out in front of him. The air is filled with the roar of the engines and the rumble of the crowd as they watch the thrilling display of skill and precision. As the rider lands smoothly on the other side, he revs up his engine and prepares for the next stunt, his bike's tires screeching slightly on the pavement.
